title: Elementary Social Studies Education Strategy Design: Integrating Critical Competencies and Immersive Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social studies education theories and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Non-degree program aimed at strengthening social studies curriculum design competencies linked to mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners design social issue analysis lesson plans applying critical pedagogy principles.
Learners develop rubrics to assess core social studies competencies (e.g., communication, problem-solving) based on a competency-based approach.
Learners propose immersive technology (VR/metaverse)-based social studies project class operation scenarios.

resources: Virtual Reality (VR) Experience Equipment (5 Rental Sets)
Access to Social Studies Education Case Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
